summary: This document consists of an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey. The correspondence indicates changes in Jeffrey's availability and mentions another individual, Caroline Kitidis, who is returning from London.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting
events.description: A meeting was initially scheduled for October 8, 2013, but was later proposed to be moved to October 10.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting with an individual named Jeffrey.
Jeffrey's availability changes, and the meeting is proposed to be rescheduled from October 8 to October 10.
Caroline Kitidis is mentioned as someone who has previously met with Jeffrey and is returning from London.
